entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 01:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow changing to ice pellets then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 6 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Temperature rising to 6 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
